zserio.runtime.io

Interface InitializeOffsetsWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Writer
    Deprecated. 
    This interface has been moved to the Writer interface. This interface will be removed in the future.

    @Deprecated
public interface InitializeOffsetsWriter
extends Writer
    Interface for writing to bit stream with offset initialization for classes generated by Zserio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long initializeOffsets(long bitPosition)
      Deprecated. 
      Initializes indexed offsets.
      void write(BitStreamWriter writer, boolean callInitializeOffsets)
      Deprecated. 
      Writes this objects to the given bit stream and optionally calls initializeOffsets.

      • Methods inherited from interface zserio.runtime.io.Writer

        initializeOffsets, write

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(BitStreamWriter writer,
           boolean callInitializeOffsets)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Writes this objects to the given bit stream and optionally calls initializeOffsets.
        Parameters:
        writer - The bit stream writer to use.
        callInitializeOffsets - True to call initializeOffsets on the object being written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws if the writing failed.

      • initializeOffsets

        long initializeOffsets(long bitPosition)
        Deprecated. 
        Initializes indexed offsets.
        Specified by:
        initializeOffsets in interface Writer
        Parameters:
        bitPosition - Current bit stream position.
        Returns:
        Updated bit stream position which points to the first bit after the array.
